# Ambient Sound Files

Place your loopable audio files (MP3 format) in this directory with the following names:

## Nature Sounds
- `rain.mp3` - Gentle rain sounds (no harsh splashing)
- `thunder.mp3` - Distant thunder rumbles (pair with rain for storms)
- `forest.mp3` - Forest ambience with rustling leaves
- `birds.mp3` - Birdsong and chirping
- `ocean.mp3` - Gentle ocean waves (not crashing)

## Indoor/Urban Sounds
- `cafe.mp3` - Coffee shop ambience (moderate chatter, no distinct voices)
- `fireplace.mp3` - Soft crackling fire (no loud pops)
- `library.mp3` - Quiet library (page turning, soft typing)

## Focus Sounds
- `whitenoise.mp3` - Smooth white noise (or brown/pink noise)
- `lofi.mp3` - Lo-fi hip-hop beats (royalty-free)

---

## Recommended Sound Specifications

| Property | Recommendation |
|----------|----------------|
| Format | MP3, 128-192kbps |
| Duration | 2-5 minutes, seamlessly loopable |
| Volume | Normalized to -14 LUFS |
| Quality | No harsh frequencies, gentle transitions |

---

## Where to Find Royalty-Free Sounds

### Free Sources
1. **Freesound.org** - https://freesound.org (Creative Commons)
2. **Pixabay** - https://pixabay.com/sound-effects (Free commercial use)
3. **Mixkit** - https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects
4. **Uppbeat** - https://uppbeat.io (Free with attribution)
5. **Zapsplat** - https://zapsplat.com (Free account required)

### Premium Sources (Higher Quality)
- **Artlist** - Subscription for unlimited downloads
- **Epidemic Sound** - Subscription model
- **AudioJungle** - Per-track licensing

---

## Sound Presets

The app includes 5 preset sound combinations:

| Preset | Sounds |
|--------|--------|
| Deep Focus | White Noise + Fireplace |
| Rainy Café | Rain + Café + Thunder |
| Nature Zen | Forest + Birds + Ocean |
| Study Lo-Fi | Lo-Fi + Library |
| Stormy Night | Rain + Thunder + Fireplace |

---

## Note
The app will continue to work without audio files, but the sound mixer won't play anything until you add the files.
